item.title: Better Dotfiles Management
item.description: In case you don’t know what dotfiles and its purpose is, refer to this. Dotfiles is a thing that most linux users have and they really put a lot of caring to them. It is really useful when you have to work on multiple environment and just want to get things done quickly. Talking about dotfiles management, there are two main method to manage them: bare git repos or simply just yadm.
